title: You Can’t Buy This, America: BYD T4 EV Truck for Hauling
description:
In the US, the Ford F-150 has been the best-selling truck for 48 consecutive years and the best-selling vehicle overall for the past 43 years. Americans love their trucks. Much of that love has little to do with actually carrying cargo in the bed. However, with ongoing construction on my ... [continued]
